mapper.select: SELECT A.PROG_ID , A.PROG_NM , A.PROG_TARGET , A.PROG_DOMAIN , A.USE_YN , A.PROG_SCRIPT , A.UILANG FROM NEO_PROG A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.UILANG = #{uilang} ORDER BY A.DISP_ORDER ASC, A.PROG_ID DESC
SELECT MENU_NM , SOURCE_PATH FROM NEO_SYSMENU WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}

SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, PARENTMENU_ID, SOURCE_PATH FROM ( SELECT T1.MENU_ID , T1.MENU_NM , T1.PARENTMENU_ID , T1.SOURCE_PATH , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T1.MENU_ID) AS SEQ FROM NEO_SYSMENU T1 , NEO_MENUUSER_MAPP T2 WHERE T1.MENU_ID = T2.MENU_ID AND T2.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T1.SERVICE_GB = #{serviceGb} AND T1.SOURCE_PATH IS NOT NULL ) SRC WHERE SEQ = 1

SELECT A.SERVICE_GB , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NEO_USER_PROG WHERE PROG_ID = A.SERVICE_GB AND USER_ID = #{userId}) USE_YN , CUST_DOMAIN , SERVICE_NM , LICENSE_KEY , 0 PAY_YN FROM NEO_SERVICEKEY A ORDER BY A.SERVICE_GB

SELECT T0.USER_ID , T0.USER_NM , T1.ORG_CD , T2.ORG_KOR_NM , T1.JOB_GB , T3.CD_NM AS JOB_NM , T0.DEPT_NO FROM NEO_USER T0 INNER JOIN NEO_USERORG_MAPP T1 ON T0.USER_ID = T1.USER_ID INNER JOIN V_NEO_ORGANIZATION T2 ON T1.ORG_CD = T2.ORG_CD INNER JOIN NEO_CD T3 ON T3.CD_GRP = 'C105' AND T1.JOB_GB = T3.CD AND T3.UILANG = #{uilang} WHERE T0.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT SUM(TT1.CNT_202) AS CNT202 , SUM(TT1.CNT_203) AS CNT203 , SUM(TT1.CNT_204) AS CNT204 , MIN(TT1.MINDATE_202) AS MINDATE202 , MAX(TT1.MAXDATE_202) AS MAXDATE202 , MIN(CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE()-7,112)) AS MINDATE2034 , MAX(CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(),112)) AS MAXDATE2034 FROM ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '202' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_202 , SUM(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '203' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_203 , SUM(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '204' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_204 , MIN(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '202' THEN SUBSTRING(T1.REG_DT,1,8) END) AS MINDATE_202 , MAX(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '202' THEN SUBSTRING(T1.REG_DT,1,8) END) AS MAXDATE_202 FROM NEO_SUBTASK T2 INNER JOIN NEO_TASK T1 ON T1.TASK_NO = T2.TASK_NO WHERE ISNULL(T2.STATUS, '000') IN ('000','001') AND T2.WORK_STATUS IN ('202','203','204') AND (CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '202' THEN 'Y' WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS IN ('203','204') AND T1.REG_DT BETWEEN (CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) + '000000') AND (CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) + '235959') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) = 'Y' AND T2.WORK_STATUS IN ('202','203','204') AND T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T1.DEPT_NO = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(DEPT_NO),-1) FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) UNION ALL SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '202' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_202 , SUM(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '203' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_203 , SUM(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '204' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_204 , MIN(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '202' THEN SUBSTRING(T2.REG_DT,1,8) END) AS MINDATE_202 , MAX(CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '202' THEN SUBSTRING(T2.REG_DT,1,8) END) AS MAXDATE_202 FROM TS_SERVICETYP T2 WHERE ISNULL(T2.STATUS, '000') IN ('000','001') AND T2.WORK_STATUS IN ('202','203','204') AND (CASE WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS = '202' THEN 'Y' WHEN T2.WORK_STATUS IN ('203','204') AND T2.REG_DT BETWEEN (CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) + '000000') AND (CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) + '235959') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) = 'Y' AND T2.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T2.DEPT_NO = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(DEPT_NO),-1) FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) ) TT1

SELECT SUM(TT1.TOT) AS CNT_TOT , SUM(TT1.SUCC) AS CNT_SUCC , SUM(TT1.FAIL) AS CNT_FAIL FROM ( SELECT SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS TOT , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SUCC , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE <> '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS FAIL FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A INNER JOIN NEO_SUBTASK B ON A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = B.SUB_TASK_NO AND ISNULL(B.SEND_TEST_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' WHERE A.SEND_DT BETWEEN #{searchYmd} + '0000' AND #{searchYmd} + '2359' AND (A.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID,'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME ) AS TOT , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.RCODE = '1' THEN FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID,'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME END ) AS SUCC , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.RCODE != '1' THEN FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID,'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME END ) AS FAIL FROM TS_RESULTLOG T1 INNER JOIN TS_MAILQUEUE T2 ON T1.MID = T2.MID AND T1.SUBID = T2.SUBID WHERE T1.STIME BETWEEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 00:00:00'), 120), '-', '/') AND REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 23:59:59'), 120), '-', '/') AND (T2.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) ) ) TT1

SELECT SUM(TT1.OPN_TOT) AS OPN_TOT FROM ( SELECT SUM(A.RESP_AR_AMT) AS OPN_TOT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG A INNER JOIN NEO_SUBTASK B ON A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = B.SUB_TASK_NO AND ISNULL(B.SEND_TEST_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' WHERE A.OPEN_DT BETWEEN #{searchYmd} + '0000' AND #{searchYmd} + '2359' AND (A.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID ) AS OPN_TOT FROM TS_RESPONSELOG T1 INNER JOIN TS_MAILQUEUE T2 ON T1.MID = T2.MID AND T1.SUBID = T2.SUBID WHERE T1.RSDATE BETWEEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 00:00:00'), 120), '-', '/') AND REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 23:59:59'), 120), '-', '/') AND (T2.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) ) TT1

SELECT TT1.SEND_RCODE , TT2.CD_NM AS SEND_RCODE_NM , SUM(TT1.ERR_CNT) AS CNT_ERR FROM ( SELECT A.SEND_RCODE , COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(A.TASK_NO, 'D20') + FORMAT(A.SUB_TASK_NO , 'D20')) AS TASK_CNT , SUM(A.SEND_AR_AMT) AS ERR_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A INNER JOIN NEO_SUBTASK B ON (A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = B.SUB_TASK_NO AND ISNULL(B.SEND_TEST_YN, 'N') <> 'Y') WHERE A.SEND_DT BETWEEN #{searchYmd} + '0000' AND #{searchYmd} + '2359' AND A.SEND_RCODE <> '000' AND (A.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) GROUP BY A.SEND_RCODE UNION ALL SELECT T3.STEP1 AS SEND_RCODE , COUNT(DISTINCT T1.TID) AS TASK_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME ) AS ERR_CNT FROM TS_RESULTLOG T1 INNER JOIN TS_MAILQUEUE T2 ON T1.MID = T2.MID AND T1.SUBID = T2.SUBID INNER JOIN TS_RCODE T3 ON T1.RCODE = T3.RCODE WHERE T1.STIME BETWEEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 00:00:00'), 120), '-', '/') AND REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 23:59:59'), 120), '-', '/') AND T1.RCODE != '1' AND (T2.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) GROUP BY T3.STEP1 ) TT1 INNER JOIN NEO_CD TT2 ON (TT2.CD_GRP = 'C035' AND TT2.UILANG = #{uilang} AND TT1.SEND_RCODE = TT2.CD) GROUP BY TT1.SEND_RCODE, TT2.CD_NM

SELECT A.CUST_DOMAIN , SUM(A.SEND_AR_AMT) AS CNT_TOT FROM NEO_AR_DOMAINLOG A INNER JOIN NEO_SUBTASK B ON A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = B.SUB_TASK_NO AND ISNULL(B.SEND_TEST_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' INNER JOIN NEO_TASK C ON A.TASK_NO = C.TASK_NO WHERE A.SEND_DAY = #{searchYmd} AND ISNULL(A.CUST_DOMAIN, 'X') LIKE '%.%' AND (C.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) ) GROUP BY A.CUST_DOMAIN ORDER BY 2 DESC

SELECT TT1.CAMP_NO , TT1.CAMP_NM , TT1.CNT_TOT FROM ( SELECT A.CAMP_NO , MAX(C.CAMP_NM) AS CAMP_NM , COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(A.TASK_NO, 'D20') + FORMAT(A.SUB_TASK_NO , 'D20')) AS CNT_TASK , SUM(A.SEND_AR_AMT) AS CNT_TOT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN A.SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_SUCC , SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEND_RCODE != '000' THEN A.SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_FAIL FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A INNER JOIN NEO_SUBTASK B ON A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = B.SUB_TASK_NO AND ISNULL(B.SEND_TEST_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' INNER JOIN NEO_CAMPAIGN C ON A.CAMP_NO = C.CAMP_NO WHERE A.SEND_DT BETWEEN #{searchYmd} + '0000' AND #{searchYmd} + '2359' AND (A.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) GROUP BY A.CAMP_NO UNION ALL SELECT T1.TID , MAX(T3.TNM) AS CAMP_NM , COUNT(DISTINCT T1.TID ) AS TASK_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME ) AS TOT , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.RCODE = '1' THEN FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME END ) AS SUCC , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.RCODE != '1' THEN FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME END ) AS FAIL FROM TS_RESULTLOG T1 INNER JOIN TS_MAILQUEUE T2 ON T1.MID = T2.MID AND T1.SUBID = T2.SUBID INNER JOIN TS_SERVICETYP T3 ON T1.TID = T3.TID WHERE T1.STIME BETWEEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 00:00:00'), 120), '-', '/') AND REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 23:59:59'), 120), '-', '/') AND (T2.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) GROUP BY T1.TID ) TT1 ORDER BY TT1.CNT_TOT DESC

SELECT AA.TIMES , SUM(AA.TASK_CNT) AS CNT_TASK , SUM(AA.TOT) AS CNT_TOT , SUM(AA.SUCC) AS CNT_SUCC , SUM(AA.FAIL) AS CNT_FAIL FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(A.SEND_DT,9,2) AS TIMES , COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(A.TASK_NO, 'D20') + FORMAT(A.SUB_TASK_NO , 'D20')) AS TASK_CNT , SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS TOT , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SUCC , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE <> '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS FAIL FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A INNER JOIN NEO_SUBTASK B ON A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = B.SUB_TASK_NO AND ISNULL(B.SEND_TEST_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' WHERE A.SEND_DT BETWEEN #{searchYmd} + '0000' AND #{searchYmd} + '2359' AND (A.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(A.SEND_DT,9,2) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTRING(T1.STIME,12,2) AS TIMES , COUNT(DISTINCT T1.TID) AS TASK_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME ) AS TOT , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.RCODE = '1' THEN FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME END ) AS SUCC , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.RCODE != '1' THEN FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME END ) AS FAIL FROM TS_RESULTLOG T1 INNER JOIN TS_MAILQUEUE T2 ON T1.MID = T2.MID AND T1.SUBID = T2.SUBID WHERE T1.STIME BETWEEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 00:00:00'), 120), '-', '/') AND REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYmd} +' 23:59:59'), 120), '-', '/') AND (T2.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(T1.STIME,12,2) UNION ALL SELECT CD AS TIMES, 0, 0, 0 ,0 FROM NEO_CD WHERE CD_GRP ='C127' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) AA WHERE AA.TIMES <= (CASE WHEN #{searchYmd} < CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE() , 112) THEN '23' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR,DATEPART(HOUR, GETDATE())) END) GROUP BY AA.TIMES ORDER BY AA.TIMES

SELECT AA.DAYS , SUM(AA.TASK_CNT) AS CNT_TASK , SUM(AA.TOT) AS CNT_TOT , SUM(AA.SUCC) AS CNT_SUCC , SUM(AA.FAIL) AS CNT_FAIL FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(A.SEND_DT,7,2) AS DAYS , COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(A.TASK_NO, 'D20') + FORMAT(A.SUB_TASK_NO , 'D20')) AS TASK_CNT , SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS TOT , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SUCC , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE <> '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS FAIL FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A INNER JOIN NEO_SUBTASK B ON A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = B.SUB_TASK_NO AND ISNULL(B.SEND_TEST_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' WHERE A.SEND_DT BETWEEN #{searchYm} + '010000' AND REPLACE(EOMONTH(#{searchYm} + '01') , '-' ,'')+ '2359' AND (A.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId})) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(A.SEND_DT,7,2) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTRING(T1.STIME,9,2) AS DAYS , COUNT(DISTINCT T1.TID) AS TASK_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME ) AS TOT , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.RCODE = '1' THEN FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME END ) AS SUCC , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.RCODE != '1' THEN FORMAT(T1.MID, 'D20') + FORMAT(T1.SUBID, 'D20') + T1.RID + T1.STIME END ) AS FAIL FROM TS_RESULTLOG T1 INNER JOIN TS_MAILQUEUE T2 ON T1.MID = T2.MID AND T1.SUBID = T2.SUBID WHERE T1.STIME BETWEEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{searchYm} + '01' +' 00:00:00'), 120), '-', '/') AND REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, REPLACE(EOMONTH(#{searchYm} + '01') , '-' ,'') +' 23:59:59'), 120), '-', '/') AND (T2.DEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(T2.DEPT_NO) FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = 'ADMIN') OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN T2.DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE T2.DATA_ALL_YN END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER T1 INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T2 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T2.DEPT_NO) WHERE T1.USER_ID = 'ADMIN')) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(T1.STIME,9,2) ) AA WHERE AA.DAYS <= (CASE WHEN #{searchYm} < LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE() , 112),6) THEN '99' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR,DATEPART(DAY,GETDATE())) END) GROUP BY AA.DAYS ORDER BY 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(T2.SEND_DT,9,2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(T2.SEND_DT,11,2) AS SEND_HH24MI , T1.TASK_NM , T1.SEND_REPEAT SEND_MODE , T7.CD_NM AS SEND_MODE_NM , T6.CAMP_NM , T1.SEG_NO , T3.SEG_NM , ISNULL(T5.USER_NM, T1.USER_ID) AS USER_NM , T4.CD_NM AS WORK_STATUS_NM , (CASE WHEN T1.PROHIBIT_CHK_TYP = '002' THEN '해당' END) AS COMPLIANCD_YN , T2.WORK_STATUS , T2.TASK_NO , T2.SUB_TASK_NO , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T2.SEND_DT DESC) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NEO_SECUAPPROVAL_LINE WHERE TASK_NO = T2.TASK_NO AND RSLT_CD = '002') = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END APPROVAL_PROC_APP_YN FROM NEO_SUBTASK T2 INNER JOIN NEO_TASK T1 ON (T1.TASK_NO = T2.TASK_NO) INNER JOIN NEO_CD T7 ON (T7.CD_GRP = 'C017' AND T1.SEND_REPEAT = T7.CD AND T7.UILANG = #{uilang}) INNER JOIN NEO_SEGMENT T3 ON (T1.SEG_NO = T3.SEG_NO) INNER JOIN NEO_CD T4 ON (T4.CD_GRP = 'C101' AND T2.WORK_STATUS = T4.CD AND T4.UILANG = #{uilang}) INNER JOIN NEO_USER T5 ON (T1.USER_ID = T5.USER_ID) INNER JOIN NEO_CAMPAIGN T6 ON (T1.CAMP_NO = T6.CAMP_NO) WHERE T2.WORK_STATUS NOT IN ('000') AND ISNULL(T2.STATUS, '000') IN ('000','001') AND T2.SEND_DT BETWEEN #{searchBoardDt} + '0000' AND #{searchBoardDt} + '2359' AND T2.RTY_TYP = '000' AND T2.SEND_DT <= FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AND (T1.DEPT_NO = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(DEPT_NO), '-1') FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) OR 'Y' = (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN DEPT_NO = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END), 'N') FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) ) ) SRC WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT C.SERVICE_GB, E.CD_NM, C.MENU_ID AS PMENU_ID, C.MENU_NM AS PMENU_NM, B.MENU_ID, B.MENU_NM, B.SOURCE_PATH, A.QMENU_YN FROM NEO_MENUUSER_MAPP A INNER JOIN NEO_SYSMENU B ON (A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID) INNER JOIN NEO_SYSMENU C ON (B.PARENTMENU_ID = C.MENU_ID) INNER JOIN NEO_USER_PROG D ON (C.SERVICE_GB = D.PROG_ID AND A.USER_ID = D.USER_ID) INNER JOIN NEO_CD E ON (D.PROG_ID = CAST(E.CD AS INT) AND E.CD_GRP = 'C111' AND E.UILANG = #{uilang}) WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY C.SERVICE_GB, C.SORT_SNO, B.SORT_SNO
